69PatchKernel::PatchKernel(MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert)
70#else
76PatchKernel::PatchKernel(bool expert)
77#endif
78 : m_expert(expert)
79{
80 // Initialize the patch
81#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
82 initialize(communicator, haloSize);
83#else
84 initialize();
85#endif
86
87 // Register the patch
88 patch::manager().registerPatch(this);
89}

137#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
158PatchKernel::PatchKernel(int id, int dimension, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert)
159#else
167PatchKernel::PatchKernel(int id, int dimension, bool expert)
168#endif
169 : m_expert(expert)
170{
171 // Initialize the patch
172#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
173 initialize(communicator, haloSize);
174#else
175 initialize();
176#endif
177
178 // Register the patch
179 patch::manager().registerPatch(this, id);
180
181 // Set the dimension
182 //
183 // Here we can only call the base function, if needed, every derived patch
184 // has to call its derived function.
185 PatchKernel::setDimension(dimension);
186}

193PatchKernel::PatchKernel(const PatchKernel &other)
194 : VTKBaseStreamer(other),
195 m_vertices(other.m_vertices),
196 m_cells(other.m_cells),
197 m_interfaces(other.m_interfaces),
198 m_alteredCells(other.m_alteredCells),
199 m_alteredInterfaces(other.m_alteredInterfaces),
200 m_nInternalVertices(other.m_nInternalVertices),
201#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
202 m_nGhostVertices(other.m_nGhostVertices),
203#endif
204 m_lastInternalVertexId(other.m_lastInternalVertexId),
205#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
206 m_firstGhostVertexId(other.m_firstGhostVertexId),
207#endif
208 m_nInternalCells(other.m_nInternalCells),
209#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
210 m_nGhostCells(other.m_nGhostCells),
211#endif
212 m_lastInternalCellId(other.m_lastInternalCellId),
213#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
214 m_firstGhostCellId(other.m_firstGhostCellId),
215#endif
216 m_vtk(other.m_vtk),
217 m_vtkWriteTarget(other.m_vtkWriteTarget),
218 m_vtkVertexMap(other.m_vtkVertexMap),
219 m_boxFrozen(other.m_boxFrozen),
220 m_boxDirty(other.m_boxDirty),
221 m_boxMinPoint(other.m_boxMinPoint),
222 m_boxMaxPoint(other.m_boxMaxPoint),
223 m_boxMinCounter(other.m_boxMinCounter),
224 m_boxMaxCounter(other.m_boxMaxCounter),
225 m_adjacenciesBuildStrategy(other.m_adjacenciesBuildStrategy),
226 m_interfacesBuildStrategy(other.m_interfacesBuildStrategy),
227 m_spawnStatus(other.m_spawnStatus),
228 m_adaptionStatus(other.m_adaptionStatus),
229 m_expert(other.m_expert),
230 m_dimension(other.m_dimension),
231 m_toleranceCustom(other.m_toleranceCustom),
232 m_tolerance(other.m_tolerance),
233 m_rank(other.m_rank),
234 m_nProcessors(other.m_nProcessors)
235#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
236 , m_communicator(MPI_COMM_NULL),
237 m_partitioningStatus(other.m_partitioningStatus),
238 m_owner(other.m_owner),
239 m_haloSize(other.m_haloSize),
240 m_partitioningCellsTag(other.m_partitioningCellsTag),
241 m_partitioningVerticesTag(other.m_partitioningVerticesTag),
242 m_partitioningSerialization(other.m_partitioningSerialization),
243 m_partitioningOutgoings(other.m_partitioningOutgoings),
244 m_partitioningGlobalExchanges(other.m_partitioningGlobalExchanges),
245 m_partitioningInfoDirty(other.m_partitioningInfoDirty),
246 m_ghostVertexOwners(other.m_ghostVertexOwners),
247 m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets(other.m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets),
248 m_ghostVertexExchangeSources(other.m_ghostVertexExchangeSources),
249 m_ghostCellOwners(other.m_ghostCellOwners),
250 m_ghostCellExchangeTargets(other.m_ghostCellExchangeTargets),
251 m_ghostCellExchangeSources(other.m_ghostCellExchangeSources)
252#endif
253{
254 // Create index generators
255 importVertexIndexGenerator(other);
256 importInterfaceIndexGenerator(other);
257 importCellIndexGenerator(other);
258
259 // Register the patch
260 patch::manager().registerPatch(this);
261
262 // Update the VTK streamer
263 replaceVTKStreamer(&other, this);
264
265#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
266 // Set the communicator
267 MPI_Comm communicator = other.getCommunicator();
268 if (communicator != MPI_COMM_NULL) {
269 initializeCommunicator(communicator);
270 }
271#endif
272}

344 // Handle patch regstration
345 patch::manager().unregisterPatch(&other);
346
347 patch::manager().registerPatch(this, m_id);
348 patch::manager().registerPatch(&other);
349
350 // Update the VTK streamer
351 //
352 // Pointers to VTK streamers has been copied, we need to replace all the
353 // pointer to the other object with pointer to this object.
354 replaceVTKStreamer(&other, this);
355
356#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
357 // Handle the communication
358 std::swap(m_communicator, other.m_communicator);
359#endif
360}

367PatchKernel & PatchKernel::operator=(PatchKernel &&other)
368{
369 VTKBaseStreamer::operator=(std::move(other));
370 m_vertices = std::move(other.m_vertices);
371 m_cells = std::move(other.m_cells);
372 m_interfaces = std::move(other.m_interfaces);
373 m_alteredCells = std::move(other.m_alteredCells);
374 m_alteredInterfaces = std::move(other.m_alteredInterfaces);
375 m_vertexIdGenerator = std::move(other.m_vertexIdGenerator);
376 m_interfaceIdGenerator = std::move(other.m_interfaceIdGenerator);
377 m_cellIdGenerator = std::move(other.m_cellIdGenerator);
378 m_nInternalVertices = std::move(other.m_nInternalVertices);
379#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
380 m_nGhostVertices = std::move(other.m_nGhostVertices);
381#endif
382 m_lastInternalVertexId = std::move(other.m_lastInternalVertexId);
383#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
384 m_firstGhostVertexId = std::move(other.m_firstGhostVertexId);
385#endif
386 m_nInternalCells = std::move(other.m_nInternalCells);
387#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
388 m_nGhostCells = std::move(other.m_nGhostCells);
389#endif
390 m_lastInternalCellId = std::move(other.m_lastInternalCellId);
391#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
392 m_firstGhostCellId = std::move(other.m_firstGhostCellId);
393#endif
394 m_vtk = std::move(other.m_vtk);
395 m_vtkWriteTarget = std::move(other.m_vtkWriteTarget);
396 m_vtkVertexMap = std::move(other.m_vtkVertexMap);
397 m_boxFrozen = std::move(other.m_boxFrozen);
398 m_boxDirty = std::move(other.m_boxDirty);
399 m_boxMinPoint = std::move(other.m_boxMinPoint);
400 m_boxMaxPoint = std::move(other.m_boxMaxPoint);
401 m_boxMinCounter = std::move(other.m_boxMinCounter);
402 m_boxMaxCounter = std::move(other.m_boxMaxCounter);
403 m_adjacenciesBuildStrategy = std::move(other.m_adjacenciesBuildStrategy);
404 m_interfacesBuildStrategy = std::move(other.m_interfacesBuildStrategy);
405 m_spawnStatus = std::move(other.m_spawnStatus);
406 m_adaptionStatus = std::move(other.m_adaptionStatus);
407 m_expert = std::move(other.m_expert);
408 m_id = std::move(other.m_id);
409 m_dimension = std::move(other.m_dimension);
410 m_toleranceCustom = std::move(other.m_toleranceCustom);
411 m_tolerance = std::move(other.m_tolerance);
412 m_rank = std::move(other.m_rank);
413 m_nProcessors = std::move(other.m_nProcessors);
414#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
415 m_communicator = std::move(MPI_COMM_NULL);
416 m_partitioningStatus = std::move(other.m_partitioningStatus);
417 m_owner = std::move(other.m_owner);
418 m_haloSize = std::move(other.m_haloSize);
419 m_partitioningCellsTag = std::move(other.m_partitioningCellsTag);
420 m_partitioningVerticesTag = std::move(other.m_partitioningVerticesTag);
421 m_partitioningSerialization = std::move(other.m_partitioningSerialization);
422 m_partitioningOutgoings = std::move(other.m_partitioningOutgoings);
423 m_partitioningGlobalExchanges = std::move(other.m_partitioningGlobalExchanges);
424 m_partitioningInfoDirty = std::move(other.m_partitioningInfoDirty);
425 m_ghostVertexOwners = std::move(other.m_ghostVertexOwners);
426 m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets = std::move(other.m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets);
427 m_ghostVertexExchangeSources = std::move(other.m_ghostVertexExchangeSources);
428 m_ghostCellOwners = std::move(other.m_ghostCellOwners);
429 m_ghostCellExchangeTargets = std::move(other.m_ghostCellExchangeTargets);
430 m_ghostCellExchangeSources = std::move(other.m_ghostCellExchangeSources);
431#endif
432
433 // Handle patch regstration
434 patch::manager().unregisterPatch(this);
435 patch::manager().unregisterPatch(&other);
436
437 patch::manager().registerPatch(this, m_id);
438 patch::manager().registerPatch(&other);
439
440 // Update the VTK streamer
441 //
442 // Pointers to VTK streamers has been moved, we need to replace all the
443 // pointer to the other object with pointer to this object.
444 replaceVTKStreamer(&other, this);
445
446#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
447 // Handle the communication
448 std::swap(m_communicator, other.m_communicator);
449#endif
450
451 return *this;
452}

457#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
464void PatchKernel::initialize(MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize)
465#else
466void PatchKernel::initialize()
467#endif
468{
469 // Id
470 m_id = PatchManager::AUTOMATIC_ID;
471
472 // Vertex count
473 m_nInternalVertices = 0;
474#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
475 m_nGhostVertices = 0;
476#endif
477
478 m_lastInternalVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
479#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
480 m_firstGhostVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
481#endif
482
483 // Cell count
484 m_nInternalCells = 0;
485#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
486 m_nGhostCells = 0;
487#endif
488
489 m_lastInternalCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
490#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
491 m_firstGhostCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
492#endif
493
494 // Dimension
495 m_dimension = -1;
496
497 // Index generators
498 setVertexAutoIndexing(true);
499 setInterfaceAutoIndexing(true);
500 setCellAutoIndexing(true);
501
502 // Set adjacencies build strategy
503 setAdjacenciesBuildStrategy(ADJACENCIES_NONE);
504
505 // Set interfaces build strategy
506 setInterfacesBuildStrategy(INTERFACES_NONE);
507
508 // Set the spawn as unneeded
509 //
510 // Specific implementation will set the appropriate status during their
511 // initialization.
512 setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_UNNEEDED);
513
514 // Set the adaption as unsupported
515 //
516 // Specific implementation will set the appropriate status during their
517 // initialization.
518 setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED);
519
520#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
521 // Initialize communicator
522 initializeCommunicator(communicator);
523
524 // Set halo size
525 initializeHaloSize(haloSize);
526
527 // Mark patch as partioned
528 if (isPartitioned()) {
529 setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_CLEAN);
530 } else {
531 setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_UNSUPPORTED);
532 }
533
534 // Initialize partitioning tags
535 m_partitioningCellsTag = -1;
536 m_partitioningVerticesTag = -1;
537
538 // Update partitioning information
539 if (isPartitioned()) {
540 updatePartitioningInfo(true);
541 }
542#else
543 // Dummy parallel information
544 m_rank = 0;
545 m_nProcessors = 1;
546#endif
547
548 // Initialize the geometrical tolerance
549 resetTol();
550
551 // Initializes the bounding box
552 setBoundingBoxFrozen(false);
553 clearBoundingBox();
554
555 // Set VTK write target
556 m_vtkWriteTarget = WRITE_TARGET_CELLS_ALL;
557
558 // Set VTK information
559 std::ostringstream convert;
560 convert << getId();
561
562 m_vtk.setName(convert.str());
563 m_vtk.setCodex(VTKFormat::APPENDED);
564
565 // Set VTK Geom Data
566 m_vtk.setGeomData<double>(VTKUnstructuredField::POINTS, this);
567 m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::OFFSETS, this);
568 m_vtk.setGeomData<int>(VTKUnstructuredField::TYPES, this);
569 m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::CONNECTIVITY, this);
570 m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_STREAMS, this);
571 m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_OFFSETS, this);
572
573 // Add VTK basic patch data
574 m_vtk.addData<long>("cellIndex", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
575 m_vtk.addData<int>("PID", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
576 m_vtk.addData<long>("vertexIndex", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::POINT, this);
577#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
578 m_vtk.addData<long>("cellGlobalIndex", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
579 m_vtk.addData<int>("cellRank", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
580 m_vtk.addData<int>("vertexRank", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::POINT, this);
581#endif
582}
583
587PatchKernel::~PatchKernel()
588{
589#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
590 freeCommunicator();
591#endif
592
593 try {
594 patch::manager().unregisterPatch(this);
595 } catch (const std::runtime_error &e) {
596 log::cout() << "Unable to unregister the patch" << std::endl;
597 log::cout() << " Error message: " << e.what() << std::endl;
598 }
599}
600
611std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::update(bool trackAdaption, bool squeezeStorage)
612{
613 std::vector<adaption::Info> updateInfo;
614
615 // Early return if the patch is not dirty
616 //
617 // If we need to squeeze the storage we need to perform the update also
618 // if the patch is not dirty.
619 if (!squeezeStorage && !isDirty(true)) {
620 return updateInfo;
621 }
622
623 // Finalize alterations
624 finalizeAlterations(squeezeStorage);
625
626 // Spawn
627 bool spawnNeeed = (getSpawnStatus() == SPAWN_NEEDED);
628 if (spawnNeeed) {
629 mergeAdaptionInfo(spawn(trackAdaption), updateInfo);
630 }
631
632 // Adaption
633 bool adaptionDirty = (getAdaptionStatus(true) == ADAPTION_DIRTY);
634 if (adaptionDirty) {
635 mergeAdaptionInfo(adaption(trackAdaption, squeezeStorage), updateInfo);
636 }
637
638 return updateInfo;
639}
640
651void PatchKernel::simulateCellUpdate(const long id, adaption::Marker marker, std::vector<Cell> *virtualCells, PiercedVector<Vertex, long> *virtualVertices) const
652{
653 BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
654 BITPIT_UNUSED(marker);
655 BITPIT_UNUSED(virtualCells);
656 BITPIT_UNUSED(virtualVertices);
657
658 throw std::runtime_error ("This function has not been implemented for the specified patch.");
659}
660
668std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::spawn(bool trackSpawn)
669{
670 std::vector<adaption::Info> spawnInfo;
671
672#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
673 // This is a collevtive operation and should be called by all processes
674 if (isPartitioned()) {
675 const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
676 MPI_Barrier(communicator);
677 }
678#endif
679
680 // Check spawn status
681 SpawnStatus spawnStatus = getSpawnStatus();
682 if (spawnStatus == SPAWN_UNNEEDED || spawnStatus == SPAWN_DONE) {
683 return spawnInfo;
684 }
685
686 // Spawn the patch
687 spawnInfo = _spawn(trackSpawn);
688
689 // Finalize patch alterations
690 finalizeAlterations(true);
691
692 // Spwan is done
693 setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_DONE);
694
695 // Done
696 return spawnInfo;
697}
698
709std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::adaption(bool trackAdaption, bool squeezeStorage)
710{
711 std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfo;
712
713 // Check adaption status
714 AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus(true);
715 if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
716 return adaptionInfo;
717 } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_DIRTY) {
718 throw std::runtime_error ("An adaption is already in progress.");
719 }
720
721 adaptionPrepare(false);
722
723 adaptionInfo = adaptionAlter(trackAdaption, squeezeStorage);
724
725 adaptionCleanup();
726
727 return adaptionInfo;
728}
729
743std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::adaptionPrepare(bool trackAdaption)
744{
745 std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfo;
746
747 // Check adaption status
748 AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus(true);
749 if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
750 return adaptionInfo;
751 } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_DIRTY) {
752 throw std::runtime_error ("An adaption is already in progress.");
753 }
754
755 // Execute the adaption preparation
756 adaptionInfo = _adaptionPrepare(trackAdaption);
757
758 // Update the status
759 setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_PREPARED);
760
761 return adaptionInfo;
762}
763
779std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::adaptionAlter(bool trackAdaption, bool squeezeStorage)
780{
781 std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfo;
782
783 // Check adaption status
784 AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus();
785 if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
786 return adaptionInfo;
787 } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_PREPARED) {
788 throw std::runtime_error ("The prepare function has not been called.");
789 }
790
791 // Adapt the patch
792 adaptionInfo = _adaptionAlter(trackAdaption);
793
794 // Finalize patch alterations
795 finalizeAlterations(squeezeStorage);
796
797 // Update the status
798 setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_ALTERED);
799
800 return adaptionInfo;
801}
802
808void PatchKernel::adaptionCleanup()
809{
810 AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus();
811 if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
812 return;
813 } else if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_PREPARED) {
814 throw std::runtime_error ("It is not yet possible to abort an adaption.");
815 } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_ALTERED) {
816 throw std::runtime_error ("The alter function has not been called.");
817 }
818
819 // Complete the adaption
820 _adaptionCleanup();
821
822 // Update the status
823 setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_CLEAN);
824}
825
830void PatchKernel::settleAdaptionMarkers()
831{
832 // Nothing to do
833}
834
841void PatchKernel::finalizeAlterations(bool squeezeStorage)
842{
843 // Flush vertex data structures
844 m_vertices.flush();
845
846 // Update bounding box
847 bool boundingBoxDirty = isBoundingBoxDirty();
848 if (boundingBoxDirty) {
849 updateBoundingBox();
850 }
851
852 // Flush cell data structures
853 m_cells.flush();
854
855 // Update adjacencies
856 bool adjacenciesDirty = areAdjacenciesDirty();
857 if (adjacenciesDirty) {
858 updateAdjacencies();
859 }
860
861 // Update interfaces
862 bool interfacesDirty = areInterfacesDirty();
863 if (interfacesDirty) {
864 updateInterfaces();
865 }
866
867 // Flush interfaces data structures
868 m_interfaces.flush();
869
870 // Squeeze the patch
871 if (squeezeStorage) {
872 squeeze();
873 }
874
875#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
876 // Update partitioning information
877 bool partitioningInfoDirty = arePartitioningInfoDirty();
878 if (partitioningInfoDirty) {
879 updatePartitioningInfo(true);
880 }
881#endif
882
883 // Clear alteration flags
884 m_alteredCells.clear();
885 m_alteredInterfaces.clear();
886
887 // Synchronize storage
888 m_cells.sync();
889 m_interfaces.sync();
890 m_vertices.sync();
891}

969void PatchKernel::reset()
970{
971 resetVertices();
972 resetCells();
973 resetInterfaces();
974}
975
979void PatchKernel::resetVertices()
980{
981 m_vertices.clear();
982 if (m_vertexIdGenerator) {
983 m_vertexIdGenerator->reset();
984 }
985 m_nInternalVertices = 0;
986#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
987 m_nGhostVertices = 0;
988#endif
989 m_lastInternalVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
990#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
991 m_firstGhostVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
992#endif
993
994 for (auto &cell : m_cells) {
995 cell.unsetConnect();
996 }
997}
998
1002void PatchKernel::resetCells()
1003{
1004 m_cells.clear();
1005 if (m_cellIdGenerator) {
1006 m_cellIdGenerator->reset();
1007 }
1008 m_nInternalCells = 0;
1009#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1010 m_nGhostCells = 0;
1011#endif
1012 m_lastInternalCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
1013#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1014 m_firstGhostCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
1015#endif
1016
1017#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1018 clearGhostCellOwners();
1019 clearGhostVertexOwners();
1020#endif
1021
1022 resetAdjacencies();
1023
1024 for (auto &interface : m_interfaces) {
1025 interface.unsetNeigh();
1026 interface.unsetOwner();
1027 }
1028
1029 m_alteredCells.clear();
1030}
1031
1038void PatchKernel::resetInterfaces()
1039{
1040 // Early return if no interfaces have been built
1041 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_NONE) {
1042 return;
1043 }
1044
1045 // Prune stale interfaces
1046 pruneStaleInterfaces();
1047
1048 // Reset the interfaces
1049 _resetInterfaces(false);
1050
1051 // All remaining interfaces will be deleted
1052 setInterfaceAlterationFlags(FLAG_DELETED);
1053
1054 // Mark cell interfaces as dirty
1055 setCellAlterationFlags(FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
1056}
1057
1067void PatchKernel::_resetInterfaces(bool release)
1068{
1069 for (auto &cell : m_cells) {
1070 cell.resetInterfaces(!release);
1071 }
1072
1073 m_interfaces.clear(release);
1074 if (m_interfaceIdGenerator) {
1075 m_interfaceIdGenerator->reset();
1076 }
1077}

1157void PatchKernel::write(const std::string &filename, VTKWriteMode mode)
1158{
1159 std::string oldFilename = m_vtk.getName();
1160
1161 m_vtk.setName(filename);
1162 write(mode);
1163 m_vtk.setName(oldFilename);
1164}
1165
1171void PatchKernel::write(VTKWriteMode mode)
1172{
1173 // Get VTK cell count
1174 long vtkCellCount = 0;
1175 if (m_vtkWriteTarget == WRITE_TARGET_CELLS_ALL) {
1176 vtkCellCount = getCellCount();
1177#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1178 } else if (m_vtkWriteTarget == WRITE_TARGET_CELLS_INTERNAL) {
1179 vtkCellCount = getInternalCellCount();
1180#endif
1181 }
1182
1183 // Set the dimensinos of the mesh
1184 PiercedStorage<bool, long> vertexWriteFlag(1, &m_vertices);
1185 vertexWriteFlag.fill(false);
1186
1187 bool vtkFaceStreamNeeded = false;
1188 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
1189 if (cell.getDimension() > 2 && !cell.hasInfo()) {
1190 vtkFaceStreamNeeded = true;
1191 break;
1192 }
1193 }
1194
1195 long vtkConnectSize = 0;
1196 long vtkFaceStreamSize = 0;
1197 for (const Cell &cell : getVTKCellWriteRange()) {
1198 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
1199 const int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
1200 for (int k = 0; k < nCellVertices; ++k) {
1201 long vertexId = cellVertexIds[k];
1202 vertexWriteFlag.at(vertexId) = true;
1203 }
1204
1205 vtkConnectSize += nCellVertices;
1206 if (vtkFaceStreamNeeded) {
1207 if (cell.getDimension() <= 2 || cell.hasInfo()) {
1208 vtkFaceStreamSize += 1;
1209 } else {
1210 vtkFaceStreamSize += cell.getFaceStreamSize();
1211 }
1212 }
1213 }
1214
1215 int vtkVertexCount = 0;
1216 m_vtkVertexMap.unsetKernel(true);
1217 m_vtkVertexMap.setStaticKernel(&m_vertices);
1218 VertexConstIterator endItr = vertexConstEnd();
1219 for (VertexConstIterator itr = vertexConstBegin(); itr != endItr; ++itr) {
1220 std::size_t vertexRawId = itr.getRawIndex();
1221 if (vertexWriteFlag.rawAt(vertexRawId)) {
1222 m_vtkVertexMap.rawAt(vertexRawId) = vtkVertexCount++;
1223 } else {
1224 m_vtkVertexMap.rawAt(vertexRawId) = Vertex::NULL_ID;
1225 }
1226 }
1227
1228 m_vtk.setDimensions(vtkCellCount, vtkVertexCount, vtkConnectSize, vtkFaceStreamSize);
1229
1230 // Write the mesh
1231 m_vtk.write(mode);
1232}

1239PatchKernel::SpawnStatus PatchKernel::getSpawnStatus() const

1241 // There is no need to check the spawn status globally because the spawn
1242 // status will always be the same on all the processes.
1243
1244 return m_spawnStatus;

1267
1275PatchKernel::AdaptionStatus PatchKernel::getAdaptionStatus(bool global) const
1276{
1277 int adaptionStatus = static_cast<int>(m_adaptionStatus);
1278
1279#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1280 if (global && isPartitioned()) {
1281 const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
1282 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &adaptionStatus, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_MAX, communicator);
1283 }
1284#else
1285 BITPIT_UNUSED(global);
1286#endif
1287
1288 return static_cast<AdaptionStatus>(adaptionStatus);
1289}
1290
1296void PatchKernel::setAdaptionStatus(AdaptionStatus status)
1297{
1298 m_adaptionStatus = status;
1299}
1300
1309bool PatchKernel::isDirty(bool global) const
1310{
1311#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
1312 BITPIT_UNUSED(global);
1313#endif
1314
1315 bool isDirty = false;
1316
1317 if (!isDirty) {
1318 isDirty |= areAdjacenciesDirty(false);
1319 }
1320
1321 if (!isDirty) {
1322 isDirty |= !m_alteredCells.empty();
1323 }
1324
1325 if (!isDirty) {
1326 isDirty |= areInterfacesDirty(false);
1327 assert(isDirty || m_alteredInterfaces.empty());
1328 }
1329
1330 if (!isDirty) {
1331 isDirty |= (getSpawnStatus() == SPAWN_NEEDED);
1332 }
1333
1334 if (!isDirty) {
1335 isDirty |= (getAdaptionStatus(false) == ADAPTION_DIRTY);
1336 }
1337
1338 if (!isDirty) {
1339 isDirty |= isBoundingBoxDirty(false);
1340 }
1341
1342#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1343 if (!isDirty) {
1344 isDirty |= arePartitioningInfoDirty(false);
1345 }
1346#endif
1347
1348 if (!isDirty) {
1349 isDirty |= !m_vertices.isSynced();
1350 }
1351
1352 if (!isDirty) {
1353 isDirty |= !m_cells.isSynced();
1354 }
1355
1356 if (!isDirty) {
1357 isDirty |= !m_interfaces.isSynced();
1358 }
1359
1360#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1361 // Get the global flag
1362 if (global && isPartitioned()) {
1363 const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
1364 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &isDirty, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LOR, communicator);
1365 }
1366#endif
1367
1368 return isDirty;
1369}

1500void PatchKernel::setVertexAutoIndexing(bool enabled)

1511 for (VertexConstIterator itr = beginItr; itr != endItr; ++itr) {
1512 m_vertexIdGenerator->setAssigned(itr.getId());
1513 }
1514 } else {
1515 m_vertexIdGenerator.reset();
1516 }

1779PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::addVertex(const Vertex &source, long id)
1780{
1781 Vertex vertex = source;
1782 vertex.setId(id);
1783
1784 return addVertex(std::move(vertex), id);
1785}
1786
1804PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::addVertex(Vertex &&source, long id)
1805{
1806 // Get the id
1807 if (id < 0) {
1808 id = source.getId();
1809 }
1810
1811 // Add a dummy vertex
1812 //
1813 // It is not possible to directly add the source into the storage. First a
1814 // dummy vertex is created and then that vertex is replaced with the source.
1815 //
1816 // The corrdinates of the dummy vertex shuold match the coordinates of the
1817 // source, because the bounding box of the patch is updated every time a
1818 // new vertex is added.
1819 VertexIterator iterator = _addInternalVertex(source.getCoords(), id);
1820
1821 // Replace the newly created vertex with the source
1822 //
1823 // Before replacing the newly created vertex we need to set the id
1824 // of the source to the id that has been assigned to the newly created
1825 // vertex, we also need to mark the vertex as internal.
1826 source.setId(iterator->getId());
1827 source.setInterior(true);
1828
1829 Vertex &vertex = (*iterator);
1830 vertex = std::move(source);
1831
1832 return iterator;
1833}
1834
1853PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::addVertex(const std::array<double, 3> &coords, long id)
1854{
1855 if (!isExpert()) {
1856 return vertexEnd();
1857 }
1858
1859 // Add the vertex
1860 VertexIterator iterator = _addInternalVertex(coords, id);
1861
1862 return iterator;
1863}
1864
1879PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::_addInternalVertex(const std::array<double, 3> &coords, long id)
1880{
1881 // Get the id
1882 if (m_vertexIdGenerator) {
1883 if (id < 0) {
1884 id = m_vertexIdGenerator->generate();
1885 } else {
1886 m_vertexIdGenerator->setAssigned(id);
1887 }
1888 } else if (id < 0) {
1889 throw std::runtime_error("No valid id has been provided for the vertex.");
1890 }
1891
1892 // Get the id of the vertex before which the new vertex should be inserted
1893#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1894 //
1895 // If there are ghosts vertices, the internal vertex should be inserted
1896 // before the first ghost vertex.
1897#endif
1898 long referenceId;
1899#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1900 referenceId = m_firstGhostVertexId;
1901#else
1902 referenceId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
1903#endif
1904
1905 // Create the vertex
1906 VertexIterator iterator;
1907 if (referenceId == Vertex::NULL_ID) {
1908 iterator = m_vertices.emreclaim(id, id, coords, true);
1909 } else {
1910 iterator = m_vertices.emreclaimBefore(referenceId, id, id, coords, true);
1911 }
1912 m_nInternalVertices++;
1913
1914 // Update the id of the last internal vertex
1915 if (m_lastInternalVertexId < 0) {
1916 m_lastInternalVertexId = id;
1917 } else if (m_vertices.rawIndex(m_lastInternalVertexId) < m_vertices.rawIndex(id)) {
1918 m_lastInternalVertexId = id;
1919 }
1920
1921 // Update the bounding box
1922 addPointToBoundingBox(iterator->getCoords());
1923
1924#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1925 // Set partitioning information as dirty
1926 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
1927#endif
1928
1929 return iterator;
1930}
1931
1932#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
1943PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::restoreVertex(const std::array<double, 3> &coords, long id)
1944{
1945 if (!isExpert()) {
1946 return vertexEnd();
1947 }
1948
1949 VertexIterator iterator = m_vertices.find(id);
1950 if (iterator == m_vertices.end()) {
1951 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore the specified vertex: the kernel doesn't contain an entry for that vertex.");
1952 }
1953
1954 _restoreInternalVertex(iterator, coords);
1955
1956 return iterator;
1957}
1958#endif
1959
1966void PatchKernel::_restoreInternalVertex(const VertexIterator &iterator, const std::array<double, 3> &coords)
1967{
1968 // Restore the vertex
1969 //
1970 // There is no need to set the id of the vertex as assigned, because
1971 // also the index generator will be restored.
1972 Vertex &vertex = *iterator;
1973 vertex.initialize(iterator.getId(), coords, true);
1974 m_nInternalVertices++;
1975
1976 // Update the bounding box
1977 addPointToBoundingBox(vertex.getCoords());
1978}
1979
1985bool PatchKernel::deleteVertex(long id)
1986{
1987 if (!isExpert()) {
1988 return false;
1989 }
1990
1991 // Delete the vertex
1992#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1993 const Vertex &vertex = m_vertices[id];
1994 bool isInternal = vertex.isInterior();
1995 if (isInternal) {
1996 _deleteInternalVertex(id);
1997 } else {
1998 _deleteGhostVertex(id);
1999 }
2000#else
2001 _deleteInternalVertex(id);
2002#endif
2003
2004 return true;
2005}
2006
2012bool PatchKernel::deleteVertices(const std::vector<long> &ids)
2013{
2014 if (!isExpert()) {
2015 return false;
2016 }
2017
2018 // Deleting the last vertex requires some additional work. If the ids
2019 // of vertices to be deleted contain the last vertex, that vertex is
2020 // deleted after deleting all other vertices. In this way we make sure
2021 // to delete the last vertex just once (after deleting the last vertex,
2022 // another vertex becomes the last one and that vertex may be on the
2023 // deletion list as well, and on and so forth). The same applies for
2024 // the first ghost.
2025 bool deleteLastInternalVertex = false;
2026#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2027 bool deleteFirstGhostVertex = false;
2028#endif
2029 std::vector<long>::const_iterator end = ids.cend();
2030 for (std::vector<long>::const_iterator i = ids.cbegin(); i != end; ++i) {
2031 long vertexId = *i;
2032 if (vertexId == m_lastInternalVertexId) {
2033 deleteLastInternalVertex = true;
2034 continue;
2035 }
2036#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2037 else if (vertexId == m_firstGhostVertexId) {
2038 deleteFirstGhostVertex = true;
2039 continue;
2040 }
2041#endif
2042
2043 deleteVertex(vertexId);
2044 }
2045
2046 if (deleteLastInternalVertex) {
2047 deleteVertex(m_lastInternalVertexId);
2048 }
2049
2050#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2051 if (deleteFirstGhostVertex) {
2052 deleteVertex(m_firstGhostVertexId);
2053 }
2054#endif
2055
2056 return true;
2057}
2058
2064void PatchKernel::_deleteInternalVertex(long id)
2065{
2066 // Update the bounding box
2067 const Vertex &vertex = m_vertices[id];
2068 removePointFromBoundingBox(vertex.getCoords());
2069
2070 // Delete vertex
2071 m_vertices.erase(id, true);
2072 m_nInternalVertices--;
2073 if (id == m_lastInternalVertexId) {
2074 updateLastInternalVertexId();
2075 }
2076
2077 // Vertex id is no longer used
2078 if (m_vertexIdGenerator) {
2079 m_vertexIdGenerator->trash(id);
2080 }
2081}
2082
2090long PatchKernel::countFreeVertices() const
2091{
2092 std::unordered_set<long> freeVertices;
2093 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2094 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
2095 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
2096 if (!cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
2097 continue;
2098 }
2099
2100 int nFaceVertices = cell.getFaceVertexCount(i);
2101 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
2102 long faceVertexId = cell.getFaceVertexId(i, k);
2103 freeVertices.insert(faceVertexId);
2104 }
2105 }
2106 }
2107
2108 return freeVertices.size();
2109}
2110
2118long PatchKernel::countOrphanVertices() const
2119{
2120 std::unordered_set<long> usedVertices;
2121 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2122 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2123 int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
2124 for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
2125 usedVertices.insert(cellVertexIds[i]);
2126 }
2127 }
2128
2129 return (getVertexCount() - usedVertices.size());
2130}
2131
2139std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findOrphanVertices()
2140{
2141 VertexConstIterator beginItr = m_vertices.cbegin();
2142 VertexConstIterator endItr = m_vertices.cend();
2143
2144 // Detect used vertices
2145 PiercedStorage<bool, long> vertexUsedFlag(1, &m_vertices);
2146 vertexUsedFlag.fill(false);
2147 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2148 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2149 int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
2150 for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; ++j) {
2151 long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
2152 vertexUsedFlag[vertexId] = true;
2153 }
2154 }
2155
2156 // Count the orphan vertices
2157 std::size_t nOrhpanVertices = 0;
2158 for (VertexConstIterator itr = beginItr; itr != endItr; ++itr) {
2159 std::size_t vertexRawIndex = itr.getRawIndex();
2160 if (!vertexUsedFlag.rawAt(vertexRawIndex)) {
2161 ++nOrhpanVertices;
2162 }
2163 }
2164
2165 // Build a list of unused vertices
2166 std::vector<long> orhpanVertices(nOrhpanVertices);
2167
2168 std::size_t orphanVertexIndex = 0;
2169 for (VertexConstIterator itr = beginItr; itr != endItr; ++itr) {
2170 std::size_t vertexRawIndex = itr.getRawIndex();
2171 if (!vertexUsedFlag.rawAt(vertexRawIndex)) {
2172 orhpanVertices[orphanVertexIndex] = itr.getId();
2173 ++orphanVertexIndex;
2174 }
2175 }
2176
2177 return orhpanVertices;
2178}
2179
2183bool PatchKernel::deleteOrphanVertices()
2184{
2185 if (!isExpert()) {
2186 return false;
2187 }
2188
2189 std::vector<long> list = findOrphanVertices();
2190 deleteVertices(list);
2191 updateBoundingBox();
2192
2193 return true;
2194}
2195
2202std::vector<long> PatchKernel::collapseCoincidentVertices()
2203{
2204 std::vector<long> collapsedVertices;
2205 if (!isExpert()) {
2206 return collapsedVertices;
2207 }
2208
2209 long nVertices = getVertexCount();
2210 if (nVertices == 0) {
2211 return collapsedVertices;
2212 }
2213
2214 // Update bounding box
2215 updateBoundingBox();
2216
2217 //
2218 // Collapse double vertices
2219 //
2220 Vertex::Less vertexLess(10 * std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
2221 auto rawVertexLess = [this, &vertexLess](const std::size_t &i, const std::size_t &j)
2222 {
2223 return vertexLess(this->m_vertices.rawAt(i), this->m_vertices.rawAt(j));
2224 };
2225 std::set<std::size_t, decltype(rawVertexLess)> vertexTree(rawVertexLess);
2226
2227 std::unordered_map<long, long> vertexMap;
2228 for (VertexConstIterator vertexItr = m_vertices.cbegin(); vertexItr != m_vertices.cend(); ++vertexItr) {
2229 std::size_t vertexRawId = vertexItr.getRawIndex();
2230 auto vertexTreeItr = vertexTree.find(vertexRawId);
2231 if (vertexTreeItr == vertexTree.end()) {
2232 vertexTree.insert(vertexRawId);
2233 } else {
2234 long vertexId = vertexItr.getId();
2235 long vertexCoincidentId = m_vertices.rawFind(*vertexTreeItr).getId();
2236 vertexMap.insert({vertexId, vertexCoincidentId});
2237 }
2238 }
2239
2240 // Collapse vertices
2241 if (!vertexMap.empty()) {
2242 // Renumber cell vertices
2243 for (Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2244 cell.renumberVertices(vertexMap);
2245 }
2246
2247 // Create the list of collapsed vertices
2248 collapsedVertices.resize(vertexMap.size());
2249
2250 std::size_t k = 0;
2251 for (const auto &entry : vertexMap) {
2252 collapsedVertices[k++] = entry.first;
2253 }
2254 }
2255
2256 return collapsedVertices;
2257}
2258
2262bool PatchKernel::deleteCoincidentVertices()
2263{
2264 if (!isExpert()) {
2265 return false;
2266 }
2267
2268 std::vector<long> verticesToDelete = collapseCoincidentVertices();
2269 deleteVertices(verticesToDelete);
2270
2271 return true;
2272}

2338void PatchKernel::updateLastInternalVertexId()
2339{
2340 if (m_nInternalVertices == 0) {
2341 m_lastInternalVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
2342 return;
2343 }
2344

2346#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2347 if (m_nGhostVertices == 0) {
2348 lastInternalVertexItr = --m_vertices.end();
2349 m_lastInternalVertexId = lastInternalVertexItr->getId();
2350 } else {
2351 m_lastInternalVertexId = m_vertices.getSizeMarker(m_nInternalVertices - 1, Vertex::NULL_ID);

2353#else
2354 lastInternalVertexItr = --m_vertices.end();
2355 m_lastInternalVertexId = lastInternalVertexItr->getId();
2356#endif

2719PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(const Cell &source, long id)
2720{

2722 cell.setId(id);
2723

2725}
2726
2741PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(Cell &&source, long id)
2742{
2743 // Get the id
2744 if (id < 0) {
2745 id = source.getId();
2746 }
2747
2748 // Add a dummy cell
2749 //
2750 // It is not possible to directly add the source into the storage. First a
2751 // dummy cell is created and then that cell is replaced with the source.
2752 std::unique_ptr<long[]> dummyConnectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(nullptr);
2753
2754 CellIterator iterator = _addInternalCell(ElementType::UNDEFINED, std::move(dummyConnectStorage), id);
2755
2756 // Replace the newly created cell with the source
2757 //
2758 // Before replacing the newly created cell we need to set the id of the
2759 // source to the id that has been assigned to the newly created cell.
2760 source.setId(iterator->getId());
2761
2762 Cell &cell = (*iterator);
2763 cell = std::move(source);
2764
2765 return iterator;
2766}
2767
2783PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(ElementType type, long id)
2784{
2785 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage;
2786 if (ReferenceElementInfo::hasInfo(type)) {
2787 int connectSize = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(type).nVertices;
2788 connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
2789 } else {
2790 connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(nullptr);
2791 }
2792
2793 return addCell(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
2794}
2795
2812PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(ElementType type, const std::vector<long> &connectivity,
2813 long id)
2814{
2815 int connectSize = connectivity.size();
2816 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
2817 std::copy(connectivity.data(), connectivity.data() + connectSize, connectStorage.get());
2818
2819 return addCell(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
2820}
2821
2839PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(ElementType type, std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
2840 long id)
2841{
2842 if (!isExpert()) {
2843 return cellEnd();
2844 }
2845
2846 if (Cell::getDimension(type) > getDimension()) {
2847 return cellEnd();
2848 }
2849
2850 CellIterator iterator = _addInternalCell(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
2851
2852 return iterator;
2853}
2854
2871PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::_addInternalCell(ElementType type, std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
2872 long id)
2873{
2874 // Get the id of the cell
2875 if (m_cellIdGenerator) {
2876 if (id < 0) {
2877 id = m_cellIdGenerator->generate();
2878 } else {
2879 m_cellIdGenerator->setAssigned(id);
2880 }
2881 } else if (id < 0) {
2882 throw std::runtime_error("No valid id has been provided for the cell.");
2883 }
2884
2885 // Get the id of the cell before which the new cell should be inserted
2886#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2887 //
2888 // If there are ghosts cells, the internal cell should be inserted
2889 // before the first ghost cell.
2890#endif
2891 long referenceId;
2892#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2893 referenceId = m_firstGhostCellId;
2894#else
2895 referenceId = Cell::NULL_ID;
2896#endif
2897
2898 // Create the cell
2899 bool storeInterfaces = (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE);
2900 bool storeAdjacencies = storeInterfaces || (getAdjacenciesBuildStrategy() != ADJACENCIES_NONE);
2901
2902 CellIterator iterator;
2903 if (referenceId == Cell::NULL_ID) {
2904 iterator = m_cells.emreclaim(id, id, type, std::move(connectStorage), true, storeInterfaces, storeAdjacencies);
2905 } else {
2906 iterator = m_cells.emreclaimBefore(referenceId, id, id, type, std::move(connectStorage), true, storeInterfaces, storeAdjacencies);
2907 }
2908 m_nInternalCells++;
2909
2910 // Update the id of the last internal cell
2911 if (m_lastInternalCellId < 0) {
2912 m_lastInternalCellId = id;
2913 } else if (m_cells.rawIndex(m_lastInternalCellId) < m_cells.rawIndex(id)) {
2914 m_lastInternalCellId = id;
2915 }
2916
2917 // Set the alteration flags of the cell
2918 setAddedCellAlterationFlags(id);
2919
2920#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2921 // Set partitioning information as dirty
2922 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
2923#endif
2924
2925 return iterator;
2926}
2927
2936void PatchKernel::setAddedCellAlterationFlags(long id)
2937{
2938 setCellAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY | FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
2939}
2940
2941#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
2954PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::restoreCell(ElementType type, std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
2955 long id)
2956{
2957 if (!isExpert()) {
2958 return cellEnd();
2959 }
2960
2961 if (Cell::getDimension(type) > getDimension()) {
2962 return cellEnd();
2963 }
2964
2965 CellIterator iterator = m_cells.find(id);
2966 if (iterator == m_cells.end()) {
2967 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore the specified cell: the kernel doesn't contain an entry for that cell.");
2968 }
2969
2970 _restoreInternalCell(iterator, type, std::move(connectStorage));
2971
2972 return iterator;
2973}
2974#endif
2975
2984void PatchKernel::_restoreInternalCell(const CellIterator &iterator, ElementType type,
2985 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage)
2986{
2987 // Restore the cell
2988 //
2989 // There is no need to set the id of the cell as assigned, because
2990 // also the index generator will be restored.
2991 bool storeInterfaces = (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE);
2992 bool storeAdjacencies = storeInterfaces || (getAdjacenciesBuildStrategy() != ADJACENCIES_NONE);
2993
2994 long cellId = iterator.getId();
2995 Cell &cell = *iterator;
2996 cell.initialize(cellId, type, std::move(connectStorage), true, storeInterfaces, storeAdjacencies);
2997 m_nInternalCells++;
2998
2999 // Set the alteration flags of the cell
3000 setRestoredCellAlterationFlags(cellId);
3001}
3002
3008void PatchKernel::setRestoredCellAlterationFlags(long id)
3009{
3010 setCellAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY | FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
3011}
3012
3018bool PatchKernel::deleteCell(long id)
3019{
3020 if (!isExpert()) {
3021 return false;
3022 }
3023
3024 // Delete cell
3025#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
3026 const Cell &cell = m_cells[id];
3027 bool isInternalCell = cell.isInterior();
3028 if (isInternalCell) {
3029 _deleteInternalCell(id);
3030 } else {
3031 _deleteGhostCell(id);
3032 }
3033#else
3034 _deleteInternalCell(id);
3035#endif
3036
3037 return true;
3038}
3039
3045bool PatchKernel::deleteCells(const std::vector<long> &ids)
3046{
3047 if (!isExpert()) {
3048 return false;
3049 }
3050
3051 // Deleteing the last internal cell requires some additional work. If the
3052 // ids of cells to be deleted contains the last internal cell, we delete
3053 // that cell ater deleting all other cells. In this way we make sure to
3054 // deleting the last internal cells just once (after deleting the last
3055 // internal, another cells becomes the last one and that cells may be
3056 // on the deletion list, and on and so forth). The same applies for the
3057 // first ghost.
3058 bool deleteLastInternalCell = false;
3059#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
3060 bool deleteFirstGhostCell = false;
3061#endif
3062 std::vector<long>::const_iterator end = ids.cend();
3063 for (std::vector<long>::const_iterator i = ids.cbegin(); i != end; ++i) {
3064 long cellId = *i;
3065 if (cellId == m_lastInternalCellId) {
3066 deleteLastInternalCell = true;
3067 continue;
3068 }
3069#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
3070 else if (cellId == m_firstGhostCellId) {
3071 deleteFirstGhostCell = true;
3072 continue;
3073 }
3074#endif
3075
3076 deleteCell(cellId);
3077 }
3078
3079 if (deleteLastInternalCell) {
3080 deleteCell(m_lastInternalCellId);
3081 }
3082
3083#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
3084 if (deleteFirstGhostCell) {
3085 deleteCell(m_firstGhostCellId);
3086 }
3087#endif
3088
3089 return true;
3090}
3091
3097void PatchKernel::_deleteInternalCell(long id)
3098{
3099 // Set the alteration flags of the cell
3100 setDeletedCellAlterationFlags(id);
3101
3102 // Delete cell
3103 m_cells.erase(id, true);
3104 m_nInternalCells--;
3105 if (id == m_lastInternalCellId) {
3106 updateLastInternalCellId();
3107 }
3108
3109 // Cell id is no longer used
3110 if (m_cellIdGenerator) {
3111 m_cellIdGenerator->trash(id);
3112 }
3113}
3114
3122void PatchKernel::setDeletedCellAlterationFlags(long id)
3123{
3124 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3125
3126 // Set the alteration flags of the cell
3127 resetCellAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_DELETED);
3128
3129 // Set the alteration flags of the adjacencies
3130 const int nCellAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount();
3131 const long *cellAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies();
3132 for (int k = 0; k < nCellAdjacencies; ++k) {
3133 long adjacencyId = cellAdjacencies[k];
3134 if (!testCellAlterationFlags(adjacencyId, FLAG_DELETED)) {
3135 setCellAlterationFlags(adjacencyId, FLAG_DANGLING | FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY | FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
3136 }
3137 }
3138
3139 // Set the alteration flags of the interfaces
3140 const int nCellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaceCount();
3141 const long *cellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaces();
3142 for (int k = 0; k < nCellInterfaces; ++k) {
3143 long interfaceId = cellInterfaces[k];
3144 if (!testInterfaceAlterationFlags(interfaceId, FLAG_DELETED)) {
3145 setInterfaceAlterationFlags(interfaceId, FLAG_DANGLING);
3146 }
3147 }
3148}
3149
3157long PatchKernel::countFreeCells() const
3158{
3159 double nFreeCells = 0;
3160 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
3161 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3162 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
3163 if (cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
3164 ++nFreeCells;
3165 break;
3166 }
3167 }
3168 }
3169
3170 return nFreeCells;
3171}
3172
3181long PatchKernel::countOrphanCells() const
3182{
3183 // Compute vertex valence
3184 std::unordered_map<long, short> vertexValence;
3185 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
3186 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
3187 int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
3188 for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; j++) {
3189 long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
3190 vertexValence[vertexId] += 1;
3191 }
3192 }
3193
3194 // Loop over cells
3195 long nOrphanCells = 0;
3196 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
3197 long isIsolated = true;
3198 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
3199 int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
3200 for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; j++) {
3201 long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
3202 if (vertexValence[vertexId] > 1) {
3203 isIsolated = false;
3204 break;
3205 }
3206 }
3207
3208 if (isIsolated) {
3209 ++nOrphanCells;
3210 }
3211 }
3212
3213 return nOrphanCells;
3214}
3215
3219void PatchKernel::updateLastInternalCellId()
3220{
3221 if (m_nInternalCells == 0) {
3222 m_lastInternalCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
3223 return;
3224 }
3225
3226 CellIterator lastInternalCellItr;
3227#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
3228 if (m_nGhostCells == 0) {
3229 lastInternalCellItr = --m_cells.end();
3230 m_lastInternalCellId = lastInternalCellItr->getId();
3231 } else {
3232 m_lastInternalCellId = m_cells.getSizeMarker(m_nInternalCells - 1, Cell::NULL_ID);
3233 }
3234#else
3235 lastInternalCellItr = --m_cells.end();
3236 m_lastInternalCellId = lastInternalCellItr->getId();
3237#endif
3238}

3323void PatchKernel::findCellNeighs(long id, int codimension, bool complete, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3324{
3325 assert(codimension >= 1 && codimension <= getDimension());
3326
3327 if (codimension == 1) {
3328 findCellFaceNeighs(id, neighs);
3329 } else if (codimension == getDimension()) {
3330 findCellVertexNeighs(id, complete, neighs);
3331 } else if (codimension == 2) {
3332 findCellEdgeNeighs(id, complete, neighs);
3333 }
3334}

3364void PatchKernel::_findCellNeighs(long id, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3365{
3366 // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3367 // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the vertex
3368 // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3369 int nCellVertices;
3370 if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3371 ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3372 const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3373 nCellVertices = cellTypeInfo.nVertices;
3374 } else {
3375 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3376 nCellVertices = cell.getVertexCount();
3377 }
3378
3379 for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
3380 _findCellVertexNeighs(id, i, blackList, neighs);
3381 }
3382}

3393void PatchKernel::findCellFaceNeighs(long id, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3394{
3395 // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3396 // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the face
3397 // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3398 int nCellFaces;
3399 if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3400 ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3401 const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3402 nCellFaces = cellTypeInfo.nFaces;
3403 } else {
3404 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3405 nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3406 }
3407
3408 // Get the neighbours
3409 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
3410 _findCellFaceNeighs(id, i, nullptr, neighs);
3411 }
3412}

3443
3457void PatchKernel::_findCellFaceNeighs(long id, int face, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3458{
3459 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3460
3461 int nFaceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount(face);
3462 const long *faceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies(face);
3463 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceAdjacencies; ++k) {
3464 long neighId = faceAdjacencies[k];
3465 if (!blackList || utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *blackList) == blackList->end()) {
3466 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
3467 }
3468 }
3469}

3489
3504void PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, bool complete, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3505{
3506 assert(isThreeDimensional());
3507 if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
3508 return;
3509 }
3510
3511 // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3512 // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the edge
3513 // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3514 int nCellEdges;
3515 if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3516 ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3517 const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3518 nCellEdges = cellTypeInfo.nEdges;
3519 } else {
3520 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3521 nCellEdges = cell.getEdgeCount();
3522 }
3523
3524 // Get the neighbours
3525 std::unique_ptr<std::vector<long>> blackList;
3526 if (!complete) {
3527 blackList = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<long>>(new std::vector<long>());
3528 findCellFaceNeighs(id, blackList.get());
3529 }
3530
3531 for (int i = 0; i < nCellEdges; ++i) {
3532 _findCellEdgeNeighs(id, i, blackList.get(), neighs);
3533 }
3534}
3535
3545std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge) const
3546{
3547 std::vector<long> neighs;
3548 findCellEdgeNeighs(id, edge, &neighs);
3549
3550 return neighs;
3551}
3552
3565void PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3566{
3567 _findCellEdgeNeighs(id, edge, nullptr, neighs);
3568}
3569
3585void PatchKernel::_findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3586{
3587 assert(isThreeDimensional());
3588 if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
3589 return;
3590 }
3591
3592 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3593 ConstProxyVector<int> edgeVertices = cell.getEdgeLocalConnect(edge);
3594 std::size_t nEdgeVertices = edgeVertices.size();
3595 if (nEdgeVertices < 2) {
3596 return;
3597 }
3598
3599 // Find candidates neighbours
3600 //
3601 // These are the negihbours of the first vertex of the edge.
3602 const int GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT = 3;
3603
3604 std::vector<long> candidateIds;
3605 candidateIds.reserve(GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT);
3606 _findCellVertexNeighs(id, edgeVertices[0], blackList, &candidateIds);
3607
3608 // Discard candidates that doesn't contain the last vertex of the edge
3609 long lastEdgeVertexId = cell.getEdgeVertexId(edge, nEdgeVertices - 1);
3610
3611 ConstProxyVector<long> candidateVertexIds;
3612 for (long candidateId : candidateIds) {
3613 const Cell &candidateNeigh = m_cells.at(candidateId);
3614 candidateVertexIds = candidateNeigh.getVertexIds();
3615 std::size_t nCandidateVertices = candidateVertexIds.size();
3616
3617 bool isEdgeNeighbour = false;
3618 for (std::size_t k = 0; k < nCandidateVertices; ++k) {
3619 if (candidateVertexIds[k] == lastEdgeVertexId) {
3620 isEdgeNeighbour = true;
3621 break;
3622 }
3623 }
3624
3625 if (isEdgeNeighbour) {
3626 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(candidateId, *neighs);
3627 }
3628 }
3629}
3630
3640std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, bool complete) const
3641{
3642 std::vector<long> neighs;
3643 findCellVertexNeighs(id, complete, &neighs);
3644
3645 return neighs;
3646}
3647
3660void PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, bool complete, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3661{
3662 // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3663 // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the vertex
3664 // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3665 int nCellVertices;
3666 if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3667 ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3668 const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3669 nCellVertices = cellTypeInfo.nVertices;
3670 } else {
3671 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3672 nCellVertices = cell.getVertexCount();
3673 }
3674
3675 // Get the neighbours
3676 std::unique_ptr<std::vector<long>> blackList;
3677 if (!complete) {
3678 blackList = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<long>>(new std::vector<long>());
3679 if (isThreeDimensional()) {
3680 findCellEdgeNeighs(id, true, blackList.get());
3681 } else {
3682 findCellFaceNeighs(id, true, blackList.get());
3683 }
3684 }
3685
3686 for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
3687 _findCellVertexNeighs(id, i, blackList.get(), neighs);
3688 }
3689}

3701 findCellVertexNeighs(id, vertex, &neighs);
3702
3703 return neighs;
3704}
3705
3716void PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, int vertex, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3717{
3718 _findCellVertexNeighs(id, vertex, nullptr, neighs);
3719}
3720
3750void PatchKernel::_findCellVertexNeighs(long id, int vertex, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3751{
3752 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3753 long vertexId = cell.getVertexId(vertex);
3754
3755 // Since we are processing a small number of cells it's more efficient to
3756 // store the list of already processed cells in a vector instead of using
3757 // a set or an unordered_set. To speed-up the lookup, the vector is kept
3758 // sorted.
3759 const int GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT = 8;
3760
3761 std::vector<long> alreadyProcessed;
3762 alreadyProcessed.reserve(GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT);
3763
3764 std::vector<long> scanQueue;
3765 scanQueue.reserve(GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT);
3766 scanQueue.push_back(id);
3767
3768 while (!scanQueue.empty()) {
3769 // Pop a cell to process
3770 long scanCellId = scanQueue.back();
3771 const Cell &scanCell = getCell(scanCellId);
3772 scanQueue.pop_back();
3773 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(scanCell.getId(), alreadyProcessed);
3774
3775 // Get cell information
3776 const ReferenceElementInfo *scanCellInfo = nullptr;
3777 const long *scanCellConnectivity = nullptr;
3778 if (scanCell.hasInfo()) {
3779 scanCellInfo = &(scanCell.getInfo());
3780 scanCellConnectivity = scanCell.getConnect();
3781 }
3782
3783 // Use face adjacencies to find vertex negihbours
3784 int nFaces;
3785 if (scanCellInfo) {
3786 nFaces = scanCellInfo->nFaces;
3787 } else {
3788 nFaces = scanCell.getFaceCount();
3789 }
3790
3791 for (int i = 0; i < nFaces; ++i) {
3792 // Discard faces with no neighbours
3793 if (scanCell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
3794 continue;
3795 }
3796
3797 // Discard faces that don't own the vertex
3798 //
3799 // We use differents algorithm depending on whether the cell has a
3800 // reference element or not. If the cell has a reference element,
3801 // accessing the local connectivity of the face is cheap. If the
3802 // cell has no reference element, it is better to avoid using the
3803 // local connectivity of the face.
3804 //
3805 // Moreover, to optimize the search for cells that has a reference
3806 // element, we work directly on the connectivity inseatd of on the
3807 // list of vertex ids. That's because for reference elements the
3808 // connectivity is just a list of vertices.
3809 bool faceOwnsVertex = false;
3810 if (scanCellInfo) {
3811 const ReferenceElementInfo &faceInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(scanCellInfo->faceTypeStorage[i]);
3812 const int *faceLocalConnectivity = scanCellInfo->faceConnectStorage[i].data();
3813 const int nFaceVertices = faceInfo.nVertices;
3814 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
3815 long faceVertexId = scanCellConnectivity[faceLocalConnectivity[k]];
3816 if (faceVertexId == vertexId) {
3817 faceOwnsVertex = true;
3818 break;
3819 }
3820 }
3821 } else {
3822 ConstProxyVector<long> faceVertexIds = scanCell.getFaceVertexIds(i);
3823 int nFaceVertices = faceVertexIds.size();
3824 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
3825 long faceVertexId = faceVertexIds[k];
3826 if (faceVertexId == vertexId) {
3827 faceOwnsVertex = true;
3828 break;
3829 }
3830 }
3831 }
3832
3833 if (!faceOwnsVertex) {
3834 continue;
3835 }
3836
3837 // Loop through the adjacencies
3838 //
3839 // Non-manifold patches may have faces with multiple adjacencies.
3840 int nFaceAdjacencies = scanCell.getAdjacencyCount(i);
3841 const long *faceAdjacencies = scanCell.getAdjacencies(i);
3842 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceAdjacencies; ++k) {
3843 long faceNeighId = faceAdjacencies[k];
3844
3845 // Discard neighbours that have already been processed
3846 if (utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(faceNeighId, alreadyProcessed) != alreadyProcessed.end()) {
3847 continue;
3848 }
3849
3850 // Update list of vertex neighbours
3851 if (!blackList || utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(faceNeighId, *blackList) == blackList->end()) {
3852 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(faceNeighId, *neighs);
3853 }
3854
3855 // Update scan list
3856 scanQueue.push_back(faceNeighId);
3857 }
3858 }
3859 }
3860}

3887void PatchKernel::findCellVertexOneRing(long id, int vertex, std::vector<long> *ring) const
3888{

3890 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(id, *ring);
3891}
3892
3909bool PatchKernel::findFaceNeighCell(long cellId, long neighId, int *cellFace, int *cellAdjacencyId) const
3910{
3911 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
3912
3913 int nFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3914 for (int i = 0; i < nFaces; ++i) {
3915 int nFaceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount(i);
3916 const long *faceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies(i);
3917 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceAdjacencies; ++k) {
3918 long faceNeighId = faceAdjacencies[k];
3919 if (faceNeighId < 0) {
3920 continue;
3921 } else if (faceNeighId == neighId) {
3922 *cellFace = i;
3923 *cellAdjacencyId = k;
3924 return true;
3925 }
3926 }
3927 }
3928
3929 *cellFace = -1;
3930 *cellAdjacencyId = -1;
3931
3932 return false;
3933}

3947
3948 return list;
3949}

3957std::vector<long> PatchKernel::getInternalCellsByPID(int pid)

3985
3996void PatchKernel::findVertexOneRing(long vertexId, std::vector<long> *ring) const
3997{
3998 // Find local id of the vertex
3999 //
4000 // Coincident vertices with different ids are not supported, this case is
4001 // special because a cell may contain a point with the vertex coordinates,
4002 // but may not contain the requested vertex (because it contains one of
4003 // the other coincident vertices).
4004 const std::array<double, 3> &coords = getVertexCoords(vertexId);
4005 long cellId = locatePoint(coords);
4006 if (cellId == bitpit::Element::NULL_ID) {
4007 return;
4008 }
4009
4010 int vertexLocalId = getCell(cellId).findVertex(vertexId);
4011 assert(vertexLocalId >= 0);
4012
4013 // Find vertex one-ring
4014 findCellVertexOneRing(cellId, vertexLocalId, ring);
4015}

4025bool PatchKernel::isInterfaceAutoIndexingEnabled() const
4026{

4029
4041void PatchKernel::setInterfaceAutoIndexing(bool enabled)
4042{
4043 if (isInterfaceAutoIndexingEnabled() == enabled) {
4044 return;
4045 }
4046
4047 if (enabled) {
4048 createInterfaceIndexGenerator();
4049
4050 InterfaceConstIterator beginItr = m_interfaces.cbegin();
4051 InterfaceConstIterator endItr = m_interfaces.cend();
4052 for (InterfaceConstIterator itr = beginItr; itr != endItr; ++itr) {
4053 m_interfaceIdGenerator->setAssigned(itr.getId());
4054 }
4055 } else {
4056 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_AUTOMATIC) {
4057 throw std::runtime_error("Auto-indexing cannot be disabled if interfaces build strategy is set to automatic.");
4058 }
4059
4060 m_interfaceIdGenerator.reset();
4061 }
4062}

4254PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(const Interface &source, long id)
4255{
4256 Interface interface = source;
4257 interface.setId(id);
4258
4259 return addInterface(std::move(interface), id);
4260}
4261
4277PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(Interface &&source, long id)
4278{
4279 // Get the id
4280 if (id < 0) {
4281 id = source.getId();
4282 }
4283
4284 // Add a dummy interface
4285 //
4286 // It is not possible to directly add the source into the storage. First
4287 // a dummy interface is created and then that interface is replaced with
4288 // the source.
4289 std::unique_ptr<long[]> dummyConnectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(nullptr);
4290
4291 InterfaceIterator iterator = _addInterface(ElementType::UNDEFINED, std::move(dummyConnectStorage), id);
4292
4293 // Replace the newly created interface with the source
4294 //
4295 // Before replacing the newly created interface we need to set the id
4296 // of the source to the id that has been assigned to the newly created
4297 // interface.
4298 source.setId(iterator->getId());
4299
4300 Interface &interface = (*iterator);
4301 interface = std::move(source);
4302
4303 return iterator;
4304}
4305
4321PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(ElementType type, long id)
4322{
4323 int connectSize = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(type).nVertices;
4324 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
4325
4326 return addInterface(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
4327}
4328
4344PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(ElementType type,
4345 const std::vector<long> &connectivity,
4346 long id)
4347{
4348 int connectSize = connectivity.size();
4349 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
4350 std::copy(connectivity.data(), connectivity.data() + connectSize, connectStorage.get());
4351
4352 return addInterface(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
4353}
4354
4371PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(ElementType type,
4372 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
4373 long id)
4374{
4375 if (!isExpert()) {
4376 return interfaceEnd();
4377 }
4378
4379 if (Interface::getDimension(type) > (getDimension() - 1)) {
4380 return interfaceEnd();
4381 }
4382
4383 InterfaceIterator iterator = _addInterface(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
4384
4385 return iterator;
4386}
4387
4404PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::_addInterface(ElementType type,
4405 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
4406 long id)
4407{
4408 // Get the id
4409 if (m_interfaceIdGenerator) {
4410 if (id < 0) {
4411 id = m_interfaceIdGenerator->generate();
4412 } else {
4413 m_interfaceIdGenerator->setAssigned(id);
4414 }
4415 } else if (id < 0) {
4416 throw std::runtime_error("No valid id has been provided for the interface.");
4417 }
4418
4419 // Create the interface
4420 PiercedVector<Interface>::iterator iterator = m_interfaces.emreclaim(id, id, type, std::move(connectStorage));
4421
4422 // Set the alteration flags
4423 setAddedInterfaceAlterationFlags(id);
4424
4425 return iterator;
4426}
4427
4436void PatchKernel::setAddedInterfaceAlterationFlags(long id)
4437{
4438 BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
4439}
4440
4453PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::restoreInterface(ElementType type,
4454 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
4455 long id)
4456{
4457 if (!isExpert()) {
4458 return interfaceEnd();
4459 }
4460
4461 if (Interface::getDimension(type) > (getDimension() - 1)) {
4462 return interfaceEnd();
4463 }
4464
4465 InterfaceIterator iterator = m_interfaces.find(id);
4466 if (iterator == m_interfaces.end()) {
4467 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore the specified interface: the kernel doesn't contain an entry for that interface.");
4468 }
4469
4470 _restoreInterface(iterator, type, std::move(connectStorage));
4471
4472 return iterator;
4473}
4474
4486void PatchKernel::_restoreInterface(const InterfaceIterator &iterator, ElementType type,
4487 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage)
4488{
4489 // Restore the interface
4490 //
4491 // There is no need to set the id of the interfaces as assigned, because
4492 // also the index generator will be restored.
4493 long interfaceId = iterator.getId();
4494 Interface &interface = *iterator;
4495 interface.initialize(interfaceId, type, std::move(connectStorage));
4496
4497 // Set the alteration flags
4498 setRestoredInterfaceAlterationFlags(interfaceId);
4499}
4500
4506void PatchKernel::setRestoredInterfaceAlterationFlags(long id)
4507{
4508 BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
4509}
4510
4516bool PatchKernel::deleteInterface(long id)
4517{
4518 if (!isExpert()) {
4519 return false;
4520 }
4521
4522 _deleteInterface(id);
4523
4524 return true;
4525}
4526
4532void PatchKernel::_deleteInterface(long id)
4533{
4534 // Set the alteration flags
4535 setDeletedInterfaceAlterationFlags(id);
4536
4537 // Delete interface
4538 m_interfaces.erase(id, true);
4539
4540 // Interface id is no longer used
4541 if (m_interfaceIdGenerator) {
4542 m_interfaceIdGenerator->trash(id);
4543 }
4544}
4545
4551bool PatchKernel::deleteInterfaces(const std::vector<long> &ids)
4552{
4553 if (!isExpert()) {
4554 return false;
4555 }
4556
4557 // Deleting the last interface requires some additional work. If the ids
4558 // of interfaces to be deleted contain the last interface, that interface
4559 // is deleted after deleting all other interfaces. In this way we make
4560 // sure to delete the last interface just once (after deleting the last
4561 // interface, another interface becomes the last one and that interface
4562 // may be on the deletion list as well, and on and so forth).
4563 long lastId;
4564 if (!m_interfaces.empty()) {
4565 lastId = m_interfaces.back().getId();
4566 } else {
4567 lastId = Interface::NULL_ID;
4568 }
4569
4570 bool deleteLast = false;
4571 std::vector<long>::const_iterator end = ids.cend();
4572 for (std::vector<long>::const_iterator i = ids.cbegin(); i != end; ++i) {
4573 std::size_t interfaceId = *i;
4574 if (interfaceId == lastId) {
4575 deleteLast = true;
4576 continue;
4577 }
4578
4579 deleteInterface(interfaceId);
4580 }
4581
4582 if (deleteLast) {
4583 deleteInterface(lastId);
4584 }
4585
4586 return true;
4587}
4588
4596void PatchKernel::setDeletedInterfaceAlterationFlags(long id)
4597{
4598 resetInterfaceAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_DELETED);
4599}
4600
4608long PatchKernel::countFreeInterfaces() const
4609{
4610 long nFreeInterfaces = 0;
4611 for (const Interface &interface : m_interfaces) {
4612 if (interface.getNeigh() < 0) {
4613 ++nFreeInterfaces;
4614 }
4615 }
4616
4617 return nFreeInterfaces;
4618}
4619
4628long PatchKernel::countOrphanInterfaces() const
4629{
4630 long nOrphanInterfaces = 0;
4631 InterfaceConstIterator endItr = interfaceConstEnd();
4632 for (InterfaceConstIterator itr = interfaceConstBegin(); itr != endItr; ++itr) {
4633 const long interfaceId = itr.getId();
4634 if (isInterfaceOrphan(interfaceId)) {
4635 ++nOrphanInterfaces;
4636 }
4637 }
4638
4639 return nOrphanInterfaces;
4640}
4641
4650std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findOrphanInterfaces() const
4651{
4652 std::vector<long> orphanInterfaces;
4653 InterfaceConstIterator endItr = interfaceConstEnd();
4654 for (InterfaceConstIterator itr = interfaceConstBegin(); itr != endItr; ++itr) {
4655 const long interfaceId = itr.getId();
4656 if (isInterfaceOrphan(interfaceId)) {
4657 orphanInterfaces.push_back(interfaceId);
4658 }
4659 }
4660
4661 return orphanInterfaces;
4662}
4663
4667bool PatchKernel::deleteOrphanInterfaces()
4668{
4669 if (!isExpert()) {
4670 return false;
4671 }
4672
4673 std::vector<long> list = findOrphanInterfaces();
4674 deleteInterfaces(list);
4675
4676 return true;
4677}
4678
4687bool PatchKernel::isInterfaceOrphan(long id) const
4688{
4689 const Interface &interface = getInterface(id);
4690
4691 // Interface is not orphan if it has an owner or a neighbour
4692 long ownerId = interface.getOwner();
4693 long neighId = interface.getNeigh();
4694 if (ownerId >= 0 && neighId >= 0) {
4695 return false;
4696 }
4697
4698 // Interface is not orphan if it's on a border face of an internal cell
4699 if (ownerId >= 0 && neighId < 0) {
4700 const Cell &owner = getCell(ownerId);
4701 if (owner.isInterior()) {
4702 return false;
4703 }
4704 }
4705
4706 return true;
4707}
4708
4714long PatchKernel::countFaces() const
4715{
4716 double nFaces = 0;
4717 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
4718 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
4719 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
4720 if (!cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
4721 nFaces += 1. / (cell.getAdjacencyCount(i) + 1);
4722 } else {
4723 nFaces += 1.;
4724 }
4725 }
4726 }
4727
4728 return ((long) round(nFaces));
4729}
4730
4738long PatchKernel::countFreeFaces() const
4739{
4740 double nFreeFaces = 0;
4741 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
4742 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
4743 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
4744 if (cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
4745 ++nFreeFaces;
4746 }
4747 }
4748 }
4749
4750 return nFreeFaces;
4751}
4752
4758void PatchKernel::dumpVertices(std::ostream &stream) const
4759{
4760 // Dump kernel
4761 m_vertices.dumpKernel(stream);
4762
4763 // Dump vertices
4764 for (const Vertex &vertex : m_vertices) {
4765 utils::binary::write(stream, vertex.getId());
4766#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4767 utils::binary::write(stream, getVertexRank(vertex.getId()));
4768#else
4769 int dummyRank = 0;
4770 utils::binary::write(stream, dummyRank);
4771#endif
4772
4773 const std::array<double, 3> &coords = vertex.getCoords();
4774 utils::binary::write(stream, coords[0]);
4775 utils::binary::write(stream, coords[1]);
4776 utils::binary::write(stream, coords[2]);
4777 }
4778
4779 // Dump ghost/internal subdivision
4780#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4781 utils::binary::write(stream, m_firstGhostVertexId);
4782 utils::binary::write(stream, m_lastInternalVertexId);
4783#else
4784 utils::binary::write(stream, Vertex::NULL_ID);
4785 utils::binary::write(stream, Vertex::NULL_ID);
4786#endif
4787}
4788
4794void PatchKernel::restoreVertices(std::istream &stream)
4795{
4796 // Restore kernel
4797 m_vertices.restoreKernel(stream);
4798
4799 // Enable advanced editing
4800 bool originalExpertStatus = isExpert();
4801 setExpert(true);
4802
4803 // Restore vertices
4804 long nVertices = m_vertices.size();
4805 for (long i = 0; i < nVertices; ++i) {
4806 long id;
4807 utils::binary::read(stream, id);
4808
4809#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4810 int rank;
4811 utils::binary::read(stream, rank);
4812#else
4813 int dummyRank;
4814 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyRank);
4815#endif
4816
4817 std::array<double, 3> coords;
4818 utils::binary::read(stream, coords[0]);
4819 utils::binary::read(stream, coords[1]);
4820 utils::binary::read(stream, coords[2]);
4821
4822#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4823 restoreVertex(std::move(coords), rank, id);
4824#else
4825 restoreVertex(std::move(coords), id);
4826#endif
4827 }
4828
4829 // Restore ghost/internal subdivision
4830#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4831 utils::binary::read(stream, m_firstGhostVertexId);
4832 utils::binary::read(stream, m_lastInternalVertexId);
4833#else
4834 long dummyFirstGhostVertexId;
4835 long dummyLastInternalVertexId;
4836 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyFirstGhostVertexId);
4837 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyLastInternalVertexId);
4838#endif
4839
4840 // Set original advanced editing status
4841 setExpert(originalExpertStatus);
4842}
4843
4849void PatchKernel::dumpCells(std::ostream &stream) const
4850{
4851 // Dump kernel
4852 m_cells.dumpKernel(stream);
4853
4854 // Dump cells
4855 for (const Cell &cell: m_cells) {
4856 utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getId());
4857 utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getPID());
4858 utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getType());
4859#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4860 utils::binary::write(stream, getCellRank(cell.getId()));
4861#else
4862 int dummyRank = 0;
4863 utils::binary::write(stream, dummyRank);
4864#endif
4865
4866 int cellConnectSize = cell.getConnectSize();
4867 utils::binary::write(stream, cellConnectSize);
4868
4869 const long *cellConnect = cell.getConnect();
4870 for (int i = 0; i < cellConnectSize; ++i) {
4871 utils::binary::write(stream, cellConnect[i]);
4872 }
4873 }
4874
4875 // Dump ghost/internal subdivision
4876#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4877 utils::binary::write(stream, m_firstGhostCellId);
4878 utils::binary::write(stream, m_lastInternalCellId);
4879#else
4880 utils::binary::write(stream, Cell::NULL_ID);
4881 utils::binary::write(stream, Cell::NULL_ID);
4882#endif
4883}
4884
4890void PatchKernel::restoreCells(std::istream &stream)
4891{
4892 // Restore kernel
4893 m_cells.restoreKernel(stream);
4894
4895 // Enable advanced editing
4896 bool originalExpertStatus = isExpert();
4897 setExpert(true);
4898
4899 // Restore cells
4900 long nCells = m_cells.size();
4901 for (long i = 0; i < nCells; ++i) {
4902 long id;
4903 utils::binary::read(stream, id);
4904
4905 int PID;
4906 utils::binary::read(stream, PID);
4907
4908 ElementType type;
4909 utils::binary::read(stream, type);
4910
4911#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4912 int rank;
4913 utils::binary::read(stream, rank);
4914#else
4915 int dummyRank;
4916 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyRank);
4917#endif
4918
4919 int cellConnectSize;
4920 utils::binary::read(stream, cellConnectSize);
4921
4922 std::unique_ptr<long[]> cellConnect = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[cellConnectSize]);
4923 for (int k = 0; k < cellConnectSize; ++k) {
4924 utils::binary::read(stream, cellConnect[k]);
4925 }
4926
4927 CellIterator iterator;
4928#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4929 iterator = restoreCell(type, std::move(cellConnect), rank, id);
4930#else
4931 iterator = restoreCell(type, std::move(cellConnect), id);
4932#endif
4933 iterator->setPID(PID);
4934 }
4935
4936 // Restore ghost/internal subdivision
4937#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4938 utils::binary::read(stream, m_firstGhostCellId);
4939 utils::binary::read(stream, m_lastInternalCellId);
4940#else
4941 long dummyFirstGhostCellId;
4942 long dummyLastInternalCellId;
4943 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyFirstGhostCellId);
4944 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyLastInternalCellId);
4945#endif
4946
4947 // Update adjacencies
4948 updateAdjacencies();
4949
4950 // Set original advanced editing status
4951 setExpert(originalExpertStatus);
4952}
4953
4959void PatchKernel::dumpInterfaces(std::ostream &stream) const
4960{
4961 // Early return if the interfaces are not build
4962 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_NONE) {
4963 return;
4964 }
4965
4966 // Dump kernel
4967 m_interfaces.dumpKernel(stream);
4968
4969 // Dump interfaces
4970 for (const Interface &interface : getInterfaces()) {
4971 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getId());
4972
4973 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getOwner());
4974 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getOwnerFace());
4975
4976 long neighId = interface.getNeigh();
4977 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getNeigh());
4978 if (neighId >= 0) {
4979 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getNeighFace());
4980 }
4981
4982 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getPID());
4983 }
4984}
4985
4991void PatchKernel::restoreInterfaces(std::istream &stream)
4992{
4993 // Early return if the interfaces are not build
4994 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_NONE) {
4995 return;
4996 }
4997
4998 // Interfaces need up-to-date adjacencies
4999 updateAdjacencies();
5000
5001 // Restore kernel
5002 m_interfaces.restoreKernel(stream);
5003
5004 // Enable advanced editing
5005 bool originalExpertStatus = isExpert();
5006 setExpert(true);
5007
5008 // Restore interfaces
5009 long nInterfaces = m_interfaces.size();
5010 for (long n = 0; n < nInterfaces; ++n) {
5011 long interfaceId;
5012 utils::binary::read(stream, interfaceId);
5013
5014 long ownerId;
5015 int ownerFace;
5016 utils::binary::read(stream, ownerId);
5017 utils::binary::read(stream, ownerFace);
5018 Cell *owner = &(m_cells.at(ownerId));
5019
5020 long neighId;
5021 int neighFace;
5022 utils::binary::read(stream, neighId);
5023 Cell *neigh;
5024 if (neighId >= 0) {
5025 utils::binary::read(stream, neighFace);
5026 neigh = &(m_cells.at(neighId));
5027 } else {
5028 neighFace = -1;
5029 neigh = nullptr;
5030 }
5031
5032 int pid;
5033 utils::binary::read(stream, pid);
5034
5035 InterfaceIterator interfaceIterator = buildCellInterface(owner, ownerFace, neigh, neighFace, interfaceId);
5036 interfaceIterator->setPID(pid);
5037 }
5038
5039 // Interfaces are now updated
5040 unsetCellAlterationFlags(FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
5041 m_alteredInterfaces.clear();
5042
5043 // Set original advanced editing status
5044 setExpert(originalExpertStatus);
5045}

5188
5192bool PatchKernel::sortVertices()
5193{
5194 if (!isExpert()) {
5195 return false;
5196 }
5197
5198 // Sort internal vertices
5199 if (m_nInternalVertices > 0) {
5200 m_vertices.sortBefore(m_lastInternalVertexId, true);
5201 updateLastInternalVertexId();
5202 }
5203
5204#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
5205 // Sort ghost cells
5206 if (m_nGhostVertices > 0) {
5207 m_vertices.sortAfter(m_firstGhostVertexId, true);
5208 updateFirstGhostVertexId();
5209 }
5210#endif
5211
5212 // Synchronize storage
5213 m_vertices.sync();
5214
5215 return true;
5216}
5217
5223bool PatchKernel::sortCells()
5224{
5225 if (!isExpert()) {
5226 return false;
5227 }
5228
5229 // Sort internal cells
5230 if (m_nInternalCells > 0) {
5231 m_cells.sortBefore(m_lastInternalCellId, true);
5232 updateLastInternalCellId();
5233 }
5234
5235#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
5236 // Sort ghost cells
5237 if (m_nGhostCells > 0) {
5238 m_cells.sortAfter(m_firstGhostCellId, true);
5239 updateFirstGhostCellId();
5240 }
5241#endif
5242
5243 // Synchronize storage
5244 m_cells.sync();
5245
5246 return true;
5247}
5248
5252bool PatchKernel::sortInterfaces()
5253{
5254 if (!isExpert()) {
5255 return false;
5256 }
5257
5258 m_interfaces.sort();
5259
5260 m_interfaces.sync();
5261
5262 return true;
5263}
5264
5269bool PatchKernel::sort()
5270{
5271 bool status = sortVertices();
5272 status |= sortCells();
5273 status |= sortInterfaces();
5274
5275 return status;
5276}
